author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I am faster than 80% of all snakes.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I did however, tip my urologist, because I am unable to pulverize my own kidney stones.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I grew up on a farm. I have seen animals having sex in every position imaginable.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Women are like wolves. If you want one you must trap it. Snare it. Tame it. Feed it.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I never smile if I can help it.... Showing one's teeth is a submission signal in primates.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: When someone smiles at me, all I see is a chimpanzee begging for its life.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: You mess with Mozart and you're gonna get bullet in your head, courtesy of Butch Cassidy.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I am not a security threat. And, my middle name is Kurt, not Fart.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I train my major blood vessels to retract into my body on command. Also, I can retract my penis up into itself.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: In an ideal world I would have all ten fingers on my left hand and the right one would just be left for punching.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I don't care what Jim says. That is not the real Ben Franklin. I am 99 sure!

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I did not become a Lackawanna County volunteer sheriff's deputy to make friends. And by the way, I haven't.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Who thought of this one: Anal fissures?

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: There are too many people in this world. We need a new plague.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Whenever I'm about to do something, I think, "Would an idiot do that?" And if they would, I would not do that thing.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: "R" is the most menacing sound in the English language. That's why it's called "murder" and not "muckduck."

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: We all have a hero in our heart.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: ...and then I kissed you with the force of a thousand waterfalls.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Number one: Inverted Penis.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: They're going to be screwed once this whole internet fad is over.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Those who can't farm, farm celery.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: The hand that reaches from the grave to grip your throat is the strong hand you want on the wheel.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: It has to be real, and HAS to be urine!

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: What's a Justice Beaver?

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I know what you're thinking. Won't that just shed more light on the penises.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: A real man swallows his vomit when a lady is present.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: You drive, my car's full of fox-meat.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: You couldn’t handle my undivided attention.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I love catching people in the act. That’s why I always whip open doors.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: All you need is love. False. The four basic human necessities are air, water, food, and shelter.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I just want to be friends, plus a little extra, also I love you.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: How would I describe myself? Three words: hardworking, alpha male, jackhammer, merciless, insatiable.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I am ready to face any challenge that might be foolish enough to face me.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Dammit, Jim! He put my stuff in jello again.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I don’t believe you, continue.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Through concentration, I can raise and lower my cholesterol at will.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: I wish I could menstruate. I’d be more in tune with the moon and the tides.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: You think you're excited? You should feel my nipples.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Babies are one of my many areas of expertise. Growing up I performed my own circumcision.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Powerpoints are the peacocks of the business world; all show, no meat.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Reject a woman, and she will never let it go. One of the many defects of their kind. Also, weak arms.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Well I say, it’s better to be hurt by someone you know, accidentally, than by a stranger, on purpose.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Cause that’s the thing about bear attacks… they come when you least expect it.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Nostalgia is truly one of the great human weaknesses. Second only to the neck.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: The eyes are the groin of the head.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: Bread is the paper of the food industry. You write your sandwich on it.

author: Dwight K. Schrute
quote: D.W.I.G.H.T – Determined, Worker, Intense, Good worker, Hard worker, Terrific.
